name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Donald Trump is a Sweet Potato

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes all occurrences of the text 'Donald Trump' to 'Trump, the angry sweet potato'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes all occurrences of the text 'Donald Trump' to 'Trump, the angry sweet potato'.
